name: ecommerce-d-choco-front
description: Frontend da loja D'Choco - Chocolates Artesanais

scripts.purge-css: purgecss --css assets/css/main.css assets/css/icone.css assets/css/carrinho.css assets/css/mobile-nav.css assets/css/slider.css assets/css/pwa.css --content '*.html' 'assets/**/*.js' --output assets/css/ --safelist 'fa-shopping-cart,fa-home,fa-store,fa-briefcase,fa-user,fa-phone,fa-envelope,fa-file,fa-twitter,fa-instagram,fa-dribbble,fa-facebook-f,.fa-,^fa-,^icon,^is-,^has-,^with-,solid,brands,mobile-bottom-nav,desktop-bottom-nav,active,show,hidden,pwa-install-prompt,pwa-install-content,pwa-install-buttons,offline-indicator,pwa-loading' && echo '✅ PurgeCSS completo'
scripts.purge-css:full: purgecss --css assets/css/main.css assets/css/icone.css assets/css/carrinho.css assets/css/mobile-nav.css assets/css/slider.css assets/css/pwa.css --content '*.html' 'assets/**/*.js' --output assets/css/ --safelist 'fa-shopping-cart,fa-home,fa-store,fa-briefcase,fa-user,fa-phone,fa-envelope,fa-file,fa-twitter,fa-instagram,fa-dribbble,fa-facebook-f,.fa-,^fa-,^icon,^is-,^has-,^with-,solid,brands,mobile-bottom-nav,desktop-bottom-nav,active,show,hidden,pwa-install-prompt,pwa-install-content,pwa-install-buttons,offline-indicator,pwa-loading' && rm -f main.css && echo '✅ PurgeCSS completo'
